mil7.2.4:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘dīpiniyā ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.2.4:1.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, dīpinī sakiṃyeva gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti, na punappunaṃ purisaṃ upeti?
mil7.2.4:1.3: Evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena āyatiṃ paṭisandhiṃ uppattiṃ gabbhaseyyaṃ cutiṃ bhedaṃ khayaṃ vināsaṃ saṃsārabhayaṃ duggatiṃ visamaṃ sampīḷitaṃ disvā ‘punabbhave nappaṭisandahissāmī’ti yoniso manasikāro karaṇīyo.
mil7.2.4:1.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, dīpiniyā ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.2.4:1.5: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena suttanipāte dhaniyagopālakasutte—
